TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Principal extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Encapsulates the account data and operations common to all security principals. This is the abstract base class from which all security principals are derived.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Custom extension classes that derive from this class can call this constructor from the derived class constructor to initialize the base class. For more information, see the [Principal Extensions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) overview topic.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. This constructor is called by derived-class constructors to initialize the base class and is not intended to be called directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Custom extension classes that derive from this class can call this constructor from the derived class constructor to initialize the base class. For more information, see the [Principal Extensions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) overview topic.

Docs.summary: Determines whether the or methods have been called on this class. This method is called by classes that derive from this principal class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method checks whether the object has been disposed before it determines whether it has been deleted.

Docs.summary: Gets the context type enumeraton value that specifies the type of principal context associated with this principal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The context type is set on the principal context object in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext> constructor. The value stored in this class is associated with the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext.ContextType%2A> property.

Docs.summary: Returns a collection of group objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This overloaded method only returns the groups of which the principal is directly a member; no recursive searches are performed. Recursive search results are available for user principal objects. For more information, see the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups%2A> method.
If the principal store is AD DS, the list of groups contains the user's primary group that is identified by the primary group ID attribute in the AD DS object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1<class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal> GetGroups() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a collection of group objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.
Docs.returns: A collection of objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method returns only the groups of which the principal is directly a member; no recursive searches are performed. Recursive search results are available for user principal objects. For more information, see the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups%2A> method.
The groups that are returned by this method may include groups from a different scope and store than the principal. For example, if the principal is an AD DS object that has a DN of "CN=SpecialGroups,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com, the returned set can contain groups that belong to the "CN=NormalGroups,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com.
If the current principal is an AD DS principal, the returned groups include the principals primary group, as indicated by the "primaryGroupId" attribute on the AD DS object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1<class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal> GetGroups(class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext contextToQuery) cil managed

Docs.param:
The object that specifies the context against which the query is performed.
When the context is located in another domain, the query is performed against the principal objects' representation in the specified context.
Docs.summary: Returns a collection of group objects that the principal is a member of and that exist in the store provided by the specified context parameter.
Docs.returns: A collection of objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method returns only the groups of which the principal is directly a member; no recursive searches are performed. Recursive search results are available for user principal objects. For more information, see the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups%2A> method.
The groups that are returned by this method may include groups from a different scope and store than the principal. For example, if the principal is an AD DS object that has a DN of "CN=SpecialGroups,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com, the returned set can contain groups that belong to the "CN=NormalGroups,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com.
If the current principal is an AD DS principal, the returned groups include the principals primary group as indicated by the primary group ID attribute on the AD DS object.

Docs.summary: Retrieves the hash created from the contents of the principal object, suited for use in hashing algorithms and data structures like a hash table.
Docs.returns: A hash code for the current principal.

Docs.returns: The underlying object type. For AD DS, AD LDS, and SAM the type is .

Docs.summary: Gets the GUID associated with this principal.
Docs.value: The Nullable associated with this principal or null if there is no GUID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property will always return null when the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal.ContextType%2A> property is set to Machine.

Docs.summary: Returns a Boolean value that specifies whether the principal is a member of the specified group.
Docs.returns: if the principal is a member of the specified group; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the current principal is an AD DS principal, the returned groups include the principal's primary group, as indicated by the primary group ID attribute on the AD DS object.

Docs.exception: The specified in the group parameter could not be found.
More than one matching was found.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of this principal.
Docs.value: The name of the principal or null if the name attribute is not set.
Docs.exception: The application tried to set the name to null.
The underlying store does not support this property.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the SAM account name for this principal.
Docs.value: The SAM account name for this principal or null if no name has been set.
Docs.exception: The application tried to set the SAM account name to null.
The application tried to set the SAM account name on a persisted principal.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save() cil managed

Docs.summary: Saves the changes that were made on the principal object to the store. If this is a new principal object, this method inserts it into the store.
Docs.exception:
The principal has not yet been associated with a object.
This type of principal cannot be inserted in the store.
An exception occurred when saving changes tnso the store, or updating the group membership in the store.
The principal already occurs in the store.
The password does not meet complexity requirements.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: The that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
Docs.summary: Saves the changes that were made on the principal object to the store. If this is a new principal object, this method inserts it into the specified context. If the principal has already been persisted, it is moved from the original context to the specified context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the specified principal context differs from the existing context, the principal is moved to the specified context, and the principal object no longer is located in the old location. If the specified context is identical to the existing context, this method saves the updates that were made on the principal object to the store. The context type of the specified context must be the same type as the current context type. This method may not be called by using the computer context type.

Docs.exception:
The principal has not yet been associated with a object.
This type of principal cannot be inserted in the store.
An exception occurred when saving changes to the store, or updating the group membership in the store.
The principal already occurs in the store.
The password does not meet complexity requirements.

Docs.summary: Gets the Security ID (SID) of the principal.
Docs.value: The for this principal or null if there is no SID.

Docs.summary: Gets the structural object class directory attribute.
Docs.value: The structural object class directory attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a user friendly string representation of the current principal object.
Docs.returns: A string representation of the current object.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the user principal name (UPN) associated with this principal.
Docs.value: The UPN associated with this principal or null if no if the UPN has not been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Setting this property to null removes the existing UPN, if one exists.

Docs.exception: The underlying store does not support this property.
